column1: # GEARS — The Geodesy and Remote Sensing Data Server Database
# Created by the students of the Accessible Earth Study Abroad Program
# File format: CSV
# Each entry should include the following keys:
# description: a shot description of the data set
# protocol: the transfer protocol
# server: the name of the data server
# path: the path to the file on the server
# filename: optional name of specific file
# format: data file format
# tar:  Boolean value indicating whether data file has been tarred
# compression: file compression
# username: optional username credentials
# password: optional password credentials
description
“UNR final GPS time series IGS08 xyz”
